feed.title: Mere Code - Comments: GTG, Astrld, RTM, oh my

entry.title: Posted by: glyph (noreply@blogger.com)
entry.summary:
It sounds like GTG ballsed something up. Whatever it was that made you delete all of your work should probably be reported as a a bug :).

I am reminded of Havoc Pennington's screed on the subject. Get them to fix whatever in the UI did not put a GIANT molly-guard over this feature :).
